headline: 2 Reasons PANW is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Palo Alto Networks’s shares (currently trading at $167.03) have posted a disappointing 15% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 5.3% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Financially motivated cluster a key player in ToolShell exploitation
summary: Researchers from Palo Alto Networks detail ransomware deployment and malicious backdoors in a campaign against Microsoft SharePoint users.

headline: July in Review: 11 Top Technology Press Releases
summary: With thousands of press releases published each month, it can be difficult to keep up with everything on PR Newswire. To help tech journalists and consumers stay on top of the month's most popular releases and newsworthy trends, here's a recap of some of the past month's most read- and engaged-with stories.

headline: Palo Alto Networks Stock: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
summary: Palo Alto Networks’ shares have trailed the broader market over the past year, yet analysts remain moderately optimistic about the company’s growth outlook.
